column2:
(§G*§!) Enables the §YFaction Assisted War§! Casus Belli against neighboring realms.
(§G*§!) Can ask faction members to pledge war support during the faction meeting.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
(§G*§!) Gain Victory in a §YFaction Assisted War§! against a neighboring realm.

(§G*§!) Enables the §YOust Foreigners§! Casus Belli against rulers of different culture-group in the realm.
(§G*§!) Can ask faction members to pledge war support during the faction meeting.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
(§G*§!) Gain Victory in an §YOust Foreigners§! war against a ruler in your realm.

(§G*§!) Chance to improve everyone's opinion of you for several years.(§G*§!) The likelihood of success depends on the skills of the faction members.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
§G*§!) Improve public image through the help of faction members.

(§G*§!) Chance to establish a Faction Trade Route in the demesne provinces of faction leader and faction members.
(§G*§!) The likelihood of success depends on the skills of the faction members.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
§G*§!) Establish a Faction Trade Route through the help of faction members.

(§G*§!) Can ask faction members to contribute §YWealth§! during the faction meeting.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
(§G*§!) Construct a new holding in any province in your demesne.

(§G*§!) Chance to increase prosperity of all provinces of faction leader and faction members.
(§G*§!) The likelihood of success depends on the skills of the faction members.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
§G*§!) Increase the prosperity through the help of faction members.

(§G*§!) Enables the §YFaction Assisted Holy War§! Casus Belli against neighboring infidel realms.
(§G*§!) Can ask faction members to pledge war support during the faction meeting.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
(§G*§!) Gain Victory in a Faction Assisted Holy War against a neighboring infidel realm.

(§G*§!) Enables the §YOust Infidels§! Casus Belli against rulers of a different religion group or who are heretics in the realm.
(§G*§!) Can ask faction members to pledge war support during the faction meeting.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
(§G*§!) Gain Victory in an §YOust Infidels§! war against a ruler in your realm.

(§G*§!) Chance to convert the religion of one of your demesne provinces to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
(§G*§!) The likelihood of success depends on the skills of the faction members.

§GSUCCESS CONDITIONS§!:
§G*§!) Convert a province's religion through the help of faction members.
